remove_cmd

remove_cmd one or more command(s)

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Dockerfile$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

my_dock <- Dockerfile$new()
